category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_skip_abort_on_sub_process
preference.preference_description: Controls the abort operation on sub-processes when the parent process is aborted. The preference is honored only for independent sub-processes. If there is a dependency from a parent process to its sub-processes, aborting the parent will also abort the dependent sub-processes, irrespective of the value of the preference. The default value is false which will abort the sub-processes along with parent process.
